**Example 1: 示例1**



Input: 

```
tccli keewidb ModifyInstance --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --Operation rename \
    --InstanceIds kee-4nmv**** kee-9clkb977 \
    --InstanceNames 重命名1 重命名2
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "f62b5c24-8d4a-4c00-97f5-3810fa5f76c6"
    }
}
```
